showerReviews.reviewText: Probably the worst loves you will experience. Don‚Äôt stop here. Tons of people just hanging around. Men‚Äôs restroom completely closed. No sign even on the door. Weird vibes all around. Went out of my way to stop here because it‚Äôs a loves. It‚Äôs not the loves vibe at all.
Nashville TN Loves. Very disappointed in this location as far as the upkeep. Staff is awesome. The Men's bathroom is bad. Fixtures are broken and it's dirty. Trash piles at the fuel islands.
The place was not as clean as it should be, although I noticed that there were quite a few workers.

with so many workers I always see at least 4 or more workers and none of them can clean this area the coffee and breakfast section.very nasty who will want to eat at a place like this? where is the manager? I bet the manager house is as nasty as this place and that's why they don't care of cleaning

showerReviews.reviewText: The recent bad comments made us lost time to find a place to take a shower after 12 hours of road. Finally we have decided to go. The shower was super clean. The staff was super polite. Plus we get extra towels. I recommend.

Truck parking is a little tight but the lot is clean. Shower rooms are on the small side but clean and there are plenty of them. Didn‚Äôt use the laundry or lounge but they looked clean and comfortable.
Talked a shower wash cloths eat at Denny's this place has it all not to mention getting gas and other Delectables select treats and drinks
Plenty of parking and well setup. Always able to get a shower here without having to wait. Staff was friendly and professional. Ate at the Denny's and the food was good and the service was not bad.

showerReviews.reviewText: A year ago I was here many times, and each time the laundry was not working and there were long lines for the shower. A year later the situation has not changed. If you need to shower and wash your clothes, choose another truck stop.
